statements: DELETE FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_level > 5;
DELETE FROM player_sessions WHERE total_gameplay_time > INTERVAL '1 hour';
DELETE FROM player_actions WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND action_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_actions WHERE action_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_rating < 3 AND feedback_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_actions WHERE session_id = (SELECT session_id FROM player_session WHERE player_id = 5);
DELETE FROM player_rewards WHERE player_id = (SELECT player_id FROM player_stats WHERE games_played < 10);
DELETE FROM GameplayEvents WHERE event_type = 'quit' AND event_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
